channel.title: CVE Feed for ZTE -- ZXCLOUD iRAI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ZTE -- ZXCLOUD iRAI

item.title: CVE-2023-25650|2024-08-02T11:25:19.352Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is an arbitrary file download vulnerability in ZXCLOUD iRAI. Since the backend does not escape special strings or restrict paths, an attacker with user permission could access the download interface by modifying the request parameter, causing arbitrary file downloads.

item.title: CVE-2023-41776|2024-08-02T19:09:47.962Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a local privilege escalation vulnerability of ZTE's ZXCLOUD iRAI.Attackers with regular user privileges can create a fake process, and to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-41780|2024-08-02T19:09:48.247Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is an unsafe DLL loading vulnerability in ZTE ZXCLOUD iRAI. Due to the program failed to adequately validate the user's input, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-41782|2024-08-02T19:09:48.353Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a DLL hijacking vulnerability in ZTE ZXCLOUD iRAI, an attacker could place a fake DLL file in a specific directory and successfully exploit this vulnerability to execute malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2023-41779|2024-08-02T19:09:48.246Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is an illegal memory access vulnerability of ZTE's ZXCLOUD iRAI product.When the vulnerability is exploited by an attacker with the common user permission, the physical machine will be crashed.

item.title: CVE-2023-25648|2024-08-02T11:25:19.340Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a weak folder permission vulnerability in ZTE's ZXCLOUD iRAI product. Due to weak folder permission, an attacker with ordinary user privileges could construct a fake DLL to execute command to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-41783|2024-08-02T19:09:48.376Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a command injection vulnerability of ZTE's ZXCLOUD iRAI. Due to the program failed to adequately validate the user's input, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to escalate local privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T14:49:04.602Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-07-09T06:41:07.828Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-22062|2024-08-01T22:35:34.788Z -- zte -- zxcloud%20irai
item.description: There is a permissions and access control vulnerability in ZXCLOUD IRAI.An attacker can elevate non-administrator permissions to administrator permissions by modifying the configuration.
